item.title: Hugo
item.description: Create Create a new site hugo new site <site name> Info Above command will create a new folder with given site name and all of the directory hierarchy will be created there Create a theme hugo new theme <theme name> Create a page from template hugo new --kind <template name stored in archetypes> <where to create under content dir> Example for directory structure is like following - archetypes - _default.md - first_template.
